title: Website Home Page – Summary
content:
ExportInsight is a comprehensive export–intelligence platform built to provide chapter-wise insights for global trade. The platform consolidates global demand, India’s export performance, market risks, import thresholds, and production advantages into actionable intelligence.Whether you're an exporter, manufacturer, processor, trader, or government agency, the platform helps you analyze profitable HS codes, avoid compliance risks, identify top markets, and scale global exports confidently.

With structured analytics across chapters such as meat, seafood, spices, cereals, fruits, vegetables, oils, processed foods, and industrial goods, ExportInsight simplifies global trade intelligence like never before.


ExportInsight is a comprehensive export–intelligence platform built to provide chapter-wise insights for global trade. The platform consolidates global demand, India’s export performance, market risks, import thresholds, and production advantages into actionable intelligence.

Whether you're an exporter, manufacturer, processor, trader, or government agency, the platform helps you analyze profitable HS codes, avoid compliance risks, identify top markets, and scale global exports confidently.

With structured analytics across chapters such as meat, seafood, spices, cereals, fruits, vegetables, oils, processed foods, and industrial goods, ExportInsight simplifies global trade intelligence like never before.

title: About
content:
About ExportInsight

ExportInsight is built on a simple mission: to strengthen India's global trade competitiveness.

ExportInsight is a not-for-profit, public-benefit platform designed to help Indian exporters, MSMEs, FPOs and students access global trade intelligence easily.

By analyzing world import statistics through an Indian perspective, the platform helps exporters identify the right markets, understand global standards, and avoid shipment rejections due to quality issues.

ExportInsight is not just a data platform — it is a step towards resource optimization, export readiness, and strengthening Brand India in the global marketplace.

⭐ What ExportInsight Offers

ExportInsight brings together all the essential components needed for India's export success — from global demand to district-level supply strength.

1️⃣ HS Code–Wise Global Import Analysis

Understand worldwide import demand for your product. Discover market growth, price shifts & buyer preferences.

2️⃣ Country-wise Import Intelligence

Top importing nations for each HS code. Helps prioritize the most profitable export destinations.

3️⃣ India's Production & Export Capability

State & district-level production factors (soil, climate, logistics). District Export Intelligence for product–market fit and volume readiness.

4️⃣ Rejection Alerts, Risk & Compliance

Market-wise rejection causes (2022–2025 trends). Quality and compliance benchmarks to safeguard India's global reputation.

5️⃣ Strategic Export Acceleration

Priority product selection – "Grow Smart" guidance. Trade agreements & tariff advantages to boost market entry success.

6️⃣ Indian Support Ecosystem

Government agencies & export promotion bodies. Cooperatives, clusters, societies for sourcing & certification support. Connect local capabilities with global opportunities.

💡 The Outcome: ExportInsight empowers exporters with accurate, actionable trade intelligence — helping India scale high-value exports, reduce risks, and capture new global markets.

Who is this platform for?

  • MSMEs starting or expanding exports.
  • Farmer Producer Organisations (FPOs), cooperatives and processors.
  • Export promotion councils, strategy and policy professionals.
  • Students, researchers and institutions focused on international trade.
  • HS-code centric
  • Data & risk aware
  • Compliance-focused
  • India-first
